that's a painting? Holy crap, that literally looks like an in-game Kerbin, and the kerbal and spaceship really look like 3D models! Unbelievable! That's magnificent indeed!
Little Katie's entry is the best. I rest my case.

My Valentina. I think the Latin says "Victory in the stars, despite death", but there could be a mistranslation.

http://i.imgur.com/yGNOWjs.png

That's what happens to hair in space. True story.

Just curious: Am I the only one who thinks these Kerbals look like Maggie Thatcher?

I thought the same. Dear God, she's back! This kerbette is not for turning...

I find it kind of strange that people picked up on yours, but not mine. Good one though

Thanks. I did the sneaky thing and ripped off some respected artwork that's in the public domain.

PsykoticCreations: Surprisingly, yours seems to be the only chesty entry so far. It does beg the question - are kerbals mammals?

Algiark: I liked your entry, but you should have given her a grin.

I think that the default kerbal head shape is very masculine-looking, so it would be nice to see a more rounded head for the females. Adding eyelids would help make them more distinguishable from the males, and would be suggestive of the eye makeup that's so commonly associated with women without having any applied. And I wouldn't think it would need to be more complicated than re-texturing the eyeballs. Having a short, rounded hairstyle would allow the hair to be integrated more into the head mesh without ruling out modders retexturing to change hairstyle, etc. I picture female kerbals as having smaller mouths than the males, too. And I really feel that makeup should be kept to a bare minimum, though I would prefer none to be used at all. If the Almighty Squad can make female kerbals look feminine with all that in mind, that would be awesome.

Can we please find out who did this? It rocks!! At a guess it is similar to the way the comic strip was drawn!! either way that is the attitude I think they should have!! Well that and the token flower power air head just because they are green, but the rest shuld be smart with attitude to compensate for the male wild abandon and edge of sanity " Hey, Y'all watch this!!" mentality.

I love the top left shape of the head!!! That is a perfect picture and I Think should be accepted as the standard shape for female head, all those drawing are great!! Please get together with someone and model this in game and send it to squad!! Or allow a modder to use it!!

LMAO!! That seem's to sum up my experience with women and the expression on the kerbals faces is priceless!!!
